participant_1.background:
I am not the best at keeping up with my family because I often do not watch the news or television, and I can be shy at times.
Helping people and trying new things are two of my favorite things to do.
I want a home with a gym and a racquetball court so I can stay in shape and enjoy my favorite sport.
I love to watch my daughters dance ballet.
my car broke down last week.

participant_2.background:
School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.
i like watching tv and movies.
Music calms my soul.
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.

content.text: Good! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well.  I'm going to be watching the news in a bit.
That's cool.  I haven't watched the news in a while.  I spend most of my time watching TV and movies.
I love to watch TV and movies as well.  I'm a big fan of sci-fi and fantasy.  What are some of your favorite shows?
I love sci-fi and fantasy shows too!  I just finished watching The Expanse, and I'm currently watching the new season of Doctor Who.
I loved The Expanse!  I'm excited to see the new season of Doctor Who.  I'm also a big fan of Star Trek and Game of Thrones.
I've heard good things about Star Trek, but I haven't seen it yet.  I've been meaning to check it out.  I've also heard good things about Game of Thrones, but I've never seen it.
You should definitely check out Star Trek.  It's a great show.  And Game of Thrones is a must-watch.  It's one of the best shows ever made.
I'll definitely check them out.  Thanks for the recommendation!
